ingredients: +   1/2 cup butter, 1 cup packed light brown sugar, 1 (20 ounce) can sliced pineapple, 10  maraschino cherries, halved, 1 cup sifted cake flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 4 large eggs, 1 cup white sugar, 1 tablespoon butter, melted, 1 teaspoon almond extract
